title.rendered: Flip through the new Esplanade View!

content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column video_bg=”yes” video_bg_url=””][vc_column_text]

Relax with the latest of the Esplanade’s stories and events. Find your magical corner to relax in and flip through the new summer issue of the glossy Esplanade View magazine.

Indulge in enticing topics with a dose of renowned Esplanade luxury. Learn more about the Ilica Project, events at the Hotel, or be inspired by a story of an elegant Esplanade wedding. Read the interview with our charismatic Bar Manager Vjenceslav Madić or with the amazing Croatian actor Goran Bogdan.

 

Read the online version or visit the hotel and take a personal copy.

 

Enjoy reading!

 

Photo credit: Karmen Poznić

Published:

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_separator][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row]
